alert.note: Alert for Southern Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 1:27PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SOUTHERN WASHINGTON AND BENNINGTON COUNTIES... HAZARDS...Snow showers accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one half mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 126 PM EST, snow showers were near Salem moving east at 45 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Arlington, Salem, Manchester, Shaftsbury, Greenwich, Manchester Center, Sunderland, Sandgate, Argyle, Glastenbury, Cossayuna, Beartown, Chiselville, Center Falls, Goose Island, Barnumville, Middle Falls, Eagleville, West Rupert, and Hidden Valley. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow covered roads and rapidly changing visibility. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
